name: The Cavern
description: The Cavern is a puzzle-adventure game designed exclusively for room-scale VR. Solve puzzles, piece together stories and venture deeper into the darkness in search of one of the greatest lost treasures of our time.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later or Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 7 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
